alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 17 at 12:26PM CST until February 17 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HOLMES...NORTH CENTRAL YAZOO AND SOUTHEASTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 1226 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yazoo City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Thornton around 1235 PM CST. Tolarville and Coxburg around 1240 PM CST. Tchula, Howard and Brozville around 1245 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Eden and Louise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
